actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to exempt range sheep industry mobile housing and temporary range cattle camps from regulations affecting permanent housing for agricultural workers.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Labor from applying regulations affecting permanent housing for agricultural workers to mobile housing in the range sheep industry or temporary range cattle camps.

titles.title: A bill to exempt range sheep industry mobile housing and temporary range cattle camps from regulations affecting permanent housing for agricultural workers.
